resources.string: Step 1: Select your favorite apps to export them and press Save
Step 2: Export your apps selected with the Download Blue icon and Share it
Import your apps on other device
Step 3: Import your FastBackup file with the Upload Purple Icon
Step 4: Press Google Play Store icon to install each app
Enjoy and share the experience FaskBackup now!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
